AMIAdvanceRADIUSSetting.description: AMIAdvanceRADIUSSetting schema contains the properties related to the Advance RADIUS settings for configuring RADIUS Authorization and privileges.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

RADIUSAuthorization.description: Privilage levels and accosciated values for RADIUS users.
RADIUSAuthorization.longDescription: This object shall contain details of the Privilage levels and accosciated values for RADIUS users.

RADIUSAuthorization.description: Privilage levels and accosciated values for RADIUS users.
RADIUSAuthorization.longDescription: This object shall contain details of the Privilage levels and accosciated values for RADIUS users.

Administrator.description: Value for the Administrator Privilage for the RADIUS users in BMC and RADIUS Server
Administrator.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a name for the Administrator Privilage in RADIUS server and BMC.

NoAccess.description: Value for the no Access for a  RADIUS users in BMC and RADIUS Server
NoAccess.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a name for the no access Privilage in RADIUS server and BMC.

Oem.description: Value for the Oem Privilage for the RADIUS users in BMC and RADIUS Server
Oem.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a name for the Oem Privilage in RADIUS server and BMC.

Operator.description: Value for the Operator Privilage for the RADIUS users in BMC and RADIUS Server
Operator.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a name for the Operator Privilage in RADIUS server and BMC.

User.description: Value for the User Privilage for the RADIUS users in BMC and RADIUS Server
User.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a name for the User Privilage in RADIUS server and BMC.
